title: Game config
description: The configuration file defining the command line, arguments and variables to launch a given game.

name.description: The name of the game as it will appear in the game list (must be unique)

uid.description: The user id of the user that will run the process

gid.description: The group id of the user that will run the process

cwd.description: Location of the directory in which the process will be launched

vars.description: User definied values to be used in command line arguments

name.description: The name of the variable used in the command line arguments prefixed by "$var_"

label.description: The name of the variable as it is displayed to the user

default.description: The default value for the variable

command.description: The command to launch, first item is the command it self then follow its arguments
